show_name: Sailor Moon SuperS Plus - Ami's First Love (special)
other_title: Bishōjo Senshi Sailor Moon Gaiden - Ami-chan no Hatsukoi (Japanese)
美少女戦士セーラームーン外伝 亜美ちゃんの初恋 (Japanese)
plot: Quiet bookworm of the Sailor Senshi Ami takes pride in her studies, but a rival naming himself "Mercurius" is suddenly outscoring her on the national exams. Combine this with a sudden love letter and a youma feeding on Ami's stress over the whole situation, and Sailor Mercury finds herself in a huge pinch.
